hero.title: Prahova Mountain Chalet
hero.subtitle: Experience the majestic beauty of the Carpathian Mountains
hero.data-ai-hint: mountain chalet exterior view carpathian mountains

experience.title: Experience Prahova's Majesty
experience.description: Nestled in the foothills of the Carpathian Mountains, our chalet offers a perfect blend of rustic charm and modern comfort, with breathtaking views of the Prahova Valley.

highlights.title: Mountain Retreat
highlights.description: Situated at 800m altitude with panoramic views

highlights.title: Forest Surroundings
highlights.description: Surrounded by pine forests with hiking trails

highlights.title: Cozy Comfort
highlights.description: Modern amenities in a traditional mountain setting

host.name: Bogdan C.
host.backstory: I'm passionate about sharing the beauty of the Carpathian Mountains with visitors. This chalet has been in my family for generations, and we've lovingly restored it to provide authentic mountain experiences with modern comforts.

features.title: Traditional Fireplace
features.description: Cozy up by the authentic Romanian fireplace during cold evenings.

features.title: Outdoor BBQ Area
features.description: Enjoy traditional Romanian grilled specialties on our dedicated outdoor BBQ.

features.title: Panoramic Terrace
features.description: Take in breathtaking views of the Carpathian Mountains from our spacious terrace.

cta.title: Ready for Your Mountain Getaway?
cta.description: Book now and experience the majesty of the Carpathian Mountains in our comfortable chalet.

details-header.title: About Prahova Mountain Chalet
details-header.subtitle: Authentic mountain living with modern comforts

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious room with queen-size bed and mountain views

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy room with two single beds

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with traditional fireplace

location-header.title: Our Location
location-header.subtitle: Perfectly positioned in the Carpathian Mountains

attractions.title: Nearby Attractions
attractions.description: Discover these spectacular places near our chalet

attractions.name: 7 Ladders Canyon
attractions.description: Spectacular canyon with metal ladders and walkways

attractions.name: Sphinx and Babele
attractions.description: Natural rock formations resembling a sphinx and mushrooms

gallery-header.title: Photo Gallery
gallery-header.subtitle: Explore our mountain chalet through images

booking-header.title: Book Your Mountain Retreat
booking-header.subtitle: Reserve your dates at Prahova Mountain Chalet

policies.title: Cancellation Policy
policies.description: Free cancellation up to 7 days before check-in. Cancellations made within 7 days of check-in receive a 30% refund.

policies.title: Check-in/Check-out
policies.description: Check-in: 2:00 PM - 8:00 PM, Check-out: by 12:00 PM

policies.title: House Rules
policies.description: No smoking inside the chalet, no loud parties after 10 PM, pets allowed with prior notice.
